      • saveStream

        java.net.URI saveStream(java.io.InputStream input,
                      int amount_to_read,
                      java.net.URI destination)
                        throws PluginException
        Read input from the provided stream. Store it into the File/URI specified in the destination parameter.
        Parameters:
        input - InputStream Stream to be read
        amount_to_read - int Amount to read. -1 indicates read until EOF.
        destination - URI
        Throws:
        PluginException
